question: 繰り返す
sourceMnemonic: <ja>繰る</ja> is "to spin" (so spinning) and <ja>返す</ja> is "to return" (so returning). Put them together and you have something that's spinning and returning to the same spot over and over. Something that does that is repeating itself, making this <vocabulary>to repeat</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to repeat over and over</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings come from <ja>繰る</ja> and <ja>返す</ja>. Combine them together to get the reading.
